mapper.select: SELECT t1.meeting_id, t1.first_create_date AS interview_date, t3.user_name AS interviewer, t5.user_name AS interviewee, t7.company_name, t10.meeting_file_id, t10.file_name, t10.sheet_name, t10.row_company, t10.clm_company, t10.row_user, t10.clm_user, t10.row_date, t10.clm_date, t10.row_meeting, t10.clm_meeting, t11.meeting_detail_id, t11.meeting_id, t11.question, t11.answer, t11.follow, t11.question_type FROM t_meeting t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN m_lms_user t2 ON t2.lms_user_id = t1.first_create_user LEFT OUTER JOIN m_user t3 ON t3.user_id = t2.user_id LEFT OUTER JOIN m_lms_user t4 ON t4.lms_user_id = t1.lms_user_id LEFT OUTER JOIN m_user t5 ON t5.user_id = t4.user_id LEFT OUTER JOIN t_user_company t6 ON t6.lms_user_id = t1.lms_user_id LEFT OUTER JOIN m_company t7 ON t7.company_id = t6.company_id LEFT OUTER JOIN t_course_user t8 ON t8.lms_user_id = t4.lms_user_id LEFT OUTER JOIN t_course_meeting t9 ON t9.course_id = t8.course_id LEFT OUTER JOIN m_meeting_file t10 ON t10.meeting_file_id = t9.meeting_file_id LEFT OUTER JOIN t_meeting_detail t11 ON t11.meeting_id = t1.meeting_id WHERE t1.meeting_id = #{meetingId} AND t1.delete_flg = #{deleteFlg} ORDER BY t11.meeting_detail_id ASC

SELECT t1.meeting_id, t1.lms_user_id, t1.first_create_user, t1.first_create_date, t4.meeting_file_id, t4.delete_flg AS meeting_file_delete_flg FROM t_meeting t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN t_course_user t2 ON t2.lms_user_id = t1.lms_user_id LEFT OUTER JOIN t_course_meeting t3 ON t3.course_id = t2.course_id LEFT OUTER JOIN m_meeting_file t4 ON t4.meeting_file_id = t3.meeting_file_id WHERE t1.lms_user_id = #{lmsUserId} AND t1.delete_flg = #{deleteFlg} ORDER BY t1.first_create_date ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE t_meeting SET delete_flg = 1, last_modified_user = #{lastModifiedUser}, last_modified_date = #{lastModifiedDate} WHERE meeting_id = #{meetingId} AND delete_flg = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_meeting ( lms_user_id, account_id, delete_flg, first_create_user, first_create_date, last_modified_user, last_modified_date ) VALUES ( #{lmsUserId}, #{accountId}, #{deleteFlg}, #{firstCreateUser}, #{firstCreateDate}, #{lastModifiedUser}, #{lastModifiedDate} )
